name: 0x12 - Web Attacks
description:
The 12th focuses on Web Attacks. After starting the class:
  • Connect to a class lab with command ssh root@172.20.0.102 and 'admin' password from hackerlab
  • From a new terminal on your computer (NOT StratoCyberLab), execute a following command
    ssh -L 3000:juiceshop:3000 -L 8888:juicynginx:80 root@127.0.0.1 -p 2222
    with a password ByteThem123. The command setups port forwarding so you can access the class services in your browser.
